statements: SELECT * FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption;
SELECT vehicle_model, energy_consumed FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, city FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption WHERE charging_stations_used >= 3 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT city, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption GROUP BY city;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT vehicle_model, energy_consumed FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, charging_stations_used FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption WHERE city LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND city = 'San Francisco' ORDER BY vehicle_model DESC;
SELECT city, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption GROUP BY city HAVING total_energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChargingStations;
SELECT station_name, location FROM ChargingStations;
SELECT station_id, charging_capacity FROM ChargingStations ORDER BY charging_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChargingHistory WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT station_name, location, charging_capacity FROM ChargingStations WHERE charging_capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM ChargingStations WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT station_name, location, charging_capacity FROM ChargingStations WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT station_name, charging_capacity FROM ChargingStations ORDER BY charging_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChargingHistory WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT station_name, start_time, end_time, energy_consumed FROM ChargingStations JOIN ChargingHistory ON ChargingStations.station_id = ChargingHistory.station_id WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption;
SELECT brand, model, battery_capacity FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM ChargingStations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT station_name, city, country FROM ChargingStations WHERE total_chargers > 10;
SELECT log_id, vehicle_id, station_id, charging_start, energy_consumed FROM ChargingLogs ORDER BY charging_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption;
SELECT brand, model, battery_capacity FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT station_name, city, country FROM ChargingStations WHERE total_chargers > 5;
SELECT log_id, vehicle_id, station_id, energy_consumed FROM ChargingLogs WHERE charging_end < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY charging_end DESC;

SELECT brand, model, station_name, city FROM ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption JOIN ChargingLogs ON ElectricVehiclesEnergyConsumption.vehicle_id = ChargingLogs.vehicle_id JOIN ChargingStations ON ChargingLogs.station_id = ChargingStations.station_id WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles;
SELECT brand_name, model_name FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 50;
SELECT location, num_charging_points FROM ChargingStations ORDER BY num_charging_points DESC;
SELECT event_id, timestamp FROM ChargingEvents WHERE event_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE charging_duration > 30 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles ORDER BY brand_name DESC, battery_capacity ASC;
SELECT brand_name, model_name, battery_capacity FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 60;
SELECT EV.brand_name, CS.location, CE.timestamp FROM ElectricVehicles EV INNER JOIN ChargingEvents CE ON EV.vehicle_id = CE.vehicle_id INNER JOIN ChargingStations CS ON CE.station_id = CS.station_id;

SELECT EV.brand_name, CE.energy_consumed, CE.charging_duration FROM ElectricVehicles EV INNER JOIN ChargingEvents CE ON EV.vehicle_id = CE.vehicle_id INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption EC ON CE.event_id = EC.event_id WHERE CE.timestamp >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT AVG(battery_capacity) AS avg_battery_capacity, SUM(charging_duration) AS total_charging_duration FROM ElectricVehicles EV INNER JOIN ChargingEvents CE ON EV.vehicle_id = CE.vehicle_id INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption EC ON CE.event_id = EC.event_id WHERE CE.timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT model_name, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 500;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations ORDER BY available_chargers DESC;
SELECT model_name, battery_capacity, charging_station_id FROM electric_vehicles WHERE charging_station_id IS NULL;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 5000 ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicles JOIN energy_consumption ON electric_vehicles.vehicle_id = energy_consumption.vehicle_id ORDER BY energy_used ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name, available_chargers FROM charging_stations WHERE operating_hours LIKE '%24/7%';
SELECT u.name, u.email, c.location_name FROM users u INNER JOIN charging_history ch ON u.user_id = ch.vehicle_id INNER JOIN charging_stations c ON ch.station_id = c.station_id;

SELECT e.model_name, e.battery_capacity, COUNT(ch.history_id) AS num_charges FROM electric_vehicles e LEFT JOIN charging_history ch ON e.vehicle_id = ch.vehicle_id GROUP BY e.vehicle_id HAVING num_charges > 5 ORDER BY num_charges DESC;
